name: UpdateDocumentItemOnBoard
description:
Update a document item on a Miro board using its URL.

This tool updates a specific document item on a Miro board. It should be called when you need to modify the content or metadata of an item on a Miro board by using its URL. Ensure you have the required 'boards:write' scope and be mindful of Level 2 rate limiting.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the Miro board where the document item will be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the item.

parameters.name: item_identifier_to_update
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the item to update on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to update.

parameters.name: document_title
parameters.description: A short text header to identify the document on the board.

value_schema.description: A short text header to identify the document.

parameters.name: document_hosting_url
parameters.description: URL where the document is hosted for updating on the Miro board.

value_schema.description: URL where the document is hosted.

parameters.name: x_axis_coordinate_on_board
parameters.description: X-axis coordinate for the item's placement on the board, with default positioning at 0. Center of the board is x: 0.

value_schema.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: y_axis_coordinate
parameters.description: Y-axis coordinate for placing the item on the board. Default is 0, with absolute positioning relative to the board center.

value_schema.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: item_height_pixels
parameters.description: Height of the document item in pixels.

value_schema.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: item_width_pixels
parameters.description: Specify the width of the item in pixels on the board.

value_schema.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: rotation_angle_degrees
parameters.description: Rotation angle of an item, in degrees, relative to the board. Positive values rotate clockwise, negative values rotate counterclockwise.

value_schema.description: Rotation angle of an item, in degrees, relative to the board. You can rotate items clockwise (right) and counterclockwise (left) by specifying positive and negative values, respectively.

parameters.name: parent_frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.
